decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize the combo of Show and Tell alongside Omniscience to quickly drop powerful cards like LÃ³rien Revealed and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn onto the battlefield for free. The deck includes a variety of card draw and search spells to help set up the combo, as well as counter spells like Spell Pierce and Force of Will to protect it. Cunning Wish allows for additional flexibility and access to sideboard cards when needed. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and win the game quickly.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Skyclave Apparition alongside disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also utilizes mana acceleration from Aether Vial and efficient removal spells to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional versatility and card advantage, while the mana base is built to support the deck's color requirements and maximize utility from lands like Wasteland and Karakas.

The focus of this deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. It uses a combination of aggressive creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Orcish Bowmasters, along with efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Molten Collapse. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Daze to control the game. The aim is to be proactive in disrupting the opponent's strategy while advancing your own game plan, ultimately leading to victory through tempo advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of disruption, removal, and efficient creatures. The deck utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Endurance to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also utilizing cards like Snuff Out and Wasteland for removal. The deck aims to ramp up mana quickly with cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Gaea's Cradle to cast powerful threats like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Wight of the Reliquary. The overall strategy is to maintain control of the game while establishing a strong board presence to ultimately outvalue the opponent.
